EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_CloudFoundrySummit_Boston_Q118.FEDERAL CF Summit Boston - 3/13/18
EmailTemplate.subject: See how government agencies are building modern software at Cloud Foundry Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2018/?utm_source=any&utm_campaign=na18&utm_content=piv]]> Cloud Foundry Summit North America is around the corner and we want you to be there!
As software transforms industries around the world, government agencies are embracing it as a strategic asset. But, with the stringent security requirements and unique operating constraints found in today’s government - how do you get there?
Share and learn alongside thousands of your peers at this year’s Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2018/?utm_source=any&utm_campaign=na18&utm_content=piv]]> in Boston -where end users convene to learn the platform from those who build and use it every day.
Specifically, in the Government Track <[[https://cfna18.sched.com/overview/type/Government+%26+Wild+Card]]> at Cloud Foundry Summit North America, agencies will have a chance to learn from each other with real-world examples and lessons learned from using Cloud Foundry and related technologies, practices, and organizational processes. Presenters include:
- Tory Galvin, Operations Research Analyst, United States Air Force
- Capt Bryon Kroger, COO, Project Kessel Run, United States Air Force
- Peter Burkholder, Innovation Specialist, General Services Administration
- Britta Gustafson, Content Designer, General Services Administration
- Keith Strini, Federal Practice Lead, Pivotal
- Bret Mogilefsky, Innovation Specialist, 18F
- Adam Furtado, Chief of Product, Kessel Run, United States Air Force
- James Coppock, Cloud Specialist, Boeing
- Sheryl Maris, System Design and Integration Specialist, Boeing
Register today <[[https://www.regonline.com/registration/checkin.aspx?EventId=2090045&MethodId=0&EventSessionId=&startnewreg=1&utm_source=all&utm_campaign=na18&utm_content=piv]]> and use the Pivotal discount code CFNA18PIV20 to get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit North America pass. We hope to see you there!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
